statements: UPDATE financial_reports SET revenue = 10000.50, expenses = 5000.75, date = '2022-05-15' WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE financial_reports SET revenue = 5000, expenses = 3000 WHERE property_name = 'ABC' AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE financial_reports SET expenses = 1500, revenue = 4500 WHERE report_id = '12345678-9abc-def0-1234-56789abcdef0';

UPDATE PropertyDetails SET property_value = 750000, address = '123 Main Street' WHERE property_id = 2;

UPDATE income SET amount = 5000.00 WHERE property_id = 1 AND source = 'Rental Income';

UPDATE tenants SET tenant_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE tenant_id = 98765;
